name: tree-sitter-stack-graphs-zeek
description: Stack graphs definition for Zeek using tree-sitter-zeek

scripts.test: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar vendor/tree-sitter-zeek --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins test
scripts.test-file: npx tree-sitter-stack-graphs test --grammar vendor/tree-sitter-zeek --tsg src/stack-graphs --builtins src/builtins
